entreprises 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Get all firms nearby a point

get_nearby.Rd

Get all firms nearby a point

get_nearby(
  latitude,
  longitude,
  endpoint = "https://entreprise.data.gouv.fr/api/sirene/v1"
)

Arguments

latitude

a double
longitude

a double
endpoint

an url

Value

a tibble

Examples

get_nearby(latitude = 48.8503, longitude = 2.30831)
#> # A tibble: 10 x 59
